title: The Stolen Kiss
description: THE STOLEN KISS--SOME THINGS YOU JUST CAN'T High-profile psychiatrist, Dr. Helaine Kristenson, is not just talented and beautiful. She's the leading authority in the field of psychosexual relationships and the bestselling author of the self-help bible, "Keeping Mr. Right". Professionally, she deals with secrets of the heart every day. Privately, she even has a few of her own to keep her busy........this is book three and the conclusion to THE SECRET TRILOGY. Add "The Secret Keeping" and "Fortune Is a Woman" [AKA 'Keeping Mr. Right'] to complete this series, or see ASIN 1438240570 "The Secret Trilogy" bargain bundle, also available on Amazon. (From the Francine Saint Marie's debut novel, THE SECRET KEEPING, book one of the trilogy, was a LAMBDA Notable Book, a finalist for the Goldie Award, a semi-finalist for the Independent Publishers Award, and an IPPY Bronze medalist. Her entire trilogy was nominated for the Ferro/Grumley literary prize in fiction.
author: Francine Saint Marie
